title: Understanding the relationship between smartphone distraction, social withdrawal, digital stress, and depression among college students: A cross-sectional study in Wuhan, China
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Yufei Qiu, Xueyang Zhao, Jiali Liu, Zhaoyang Li, Man Wu, Lixin Qiu, Zhenfang Xiong, Xiaopan Wang, Fen Yang
